author: Brittany Vincent
title: P!nk Opens Up About Her Son’s ‘Terrifying’ Coronavirus Symptoms
description: P!nk opened up for a painfully raw conversation about her experience with coronavirus and how it affected her and her son while they found the illness.
content:
Pop star P!nk just went through one of the most 'terrifying' experiences of her life, and it could happen to any of us.
She and her 3-year-old son Jameson recently contracted COVID-19, an ordeal that the "Try" singer discussed on Thursday's (April 9) episode… [+2649 chars]
